name: 玄德
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><preparingStage></preparingStage></tickingLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><roleDefault></roleDefault></roleSelector><draw><drawHead></drawHead>共x(“x”为<you></you><lostHealthPoints></lostHealthPoints>+1的一半，<roundUp><roundUp0></roundUp0></roundUp>)的<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></make>；<you></you>的<handLimit></handLimit>+x。

role.lore: 濬哲文明，溫恭允塞，玄德升聞

name: 允中
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><actingStage></actingStage></tickingLimit><numberLimit class="irreplaceable"><numberLimiting><numberLimitingHead></numberLimitingHead>两<numberLimitingEnd></numberLimitingEnd></numberLimiting></numberLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><can><canHead></canHead><or><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最多的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><discard><discardBody1></discardBody1></discard><selector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable">一张</targetNumberLimit><cardDefault></cardDefault></selector></each></make><orBody></orBody><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最少的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><draw><drawHead></drawHead>一张<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></each></make></or></can>。
